alfred3_scheduler: Organize Experiment Appointments
====================================================

Installation
--------------

Alfred3_scheduler can be installed via pip::

    $ pip3 install alfred3_scheduler


.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :hidden:

   CHANGELOG
